name: Adeen_Edeemir
content:
Adeen Edeemir—"Merciless Bite" in Mando'a—was the name given to a large k'lor'slug that Shae Vizla's Mandalorians kept on Tracyn Island on the planet Rishi. The creature was one of a number of challenges that were kept in the Mandalorians' compound to test themselves against.
Adeen Edeemir first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan, a 2014 Digital Expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. The k'lor'slug is one of three bosses—along with the lurker Pirun Ut and the rancor Cerar Be Kyr'am—that appear in one iteration of the "Blood Hunt" Tactical Flashpoint; a second version of the Flashpoint features the tonitran Hodayc Sur'haai, the jurgoran Yustapir Kyramud and the krak'jya Dralne be te Oya'karir. As the challenges can change, this article refrains from specifying which challenges were faced by the canon characters.
